character.statement: Wait a minute, you aren't famous.
Hey, look over there! Isn't that former child star Willy Bingleman going into Queequeg's?
How could somebody traveling in a golden blimp not be a star?
Lighting... Composition... F-stops... Photography is such a lost art!
Ah, a fine piece of equipment! You just need the right film.
*sigh* Just put this in the camera. It'll work... I promise.
Uh... I think that's already been done.
There's no reason to use the camera here.
Maybe someone around here can help me fix this thing.
I've got a great idea for a script. Imagine astronauts mixed with medieval knights and robots!
